## Openwashdata

[openwashdata](https://openwashdata.org) is an active global community that applies FAIR principles to data generated in the greater water, sanitation, and hygiene (WASH) sector. Open Wash Data's mission is to empower WASH professionals to engage with tools and workflows for open data and code.
